effects: Restore 50 MP to the rest of the party
Restore 40 (+0.3x, Heal) MP split over 3 turns to the rest of the party
name: Manatopia

desc_short.0: Restore MP for all allies except self and gradually restore MP
desc_short.5: Recupera los PM de todos los aliados menos del usuario y los PM se van recuperando automáticamente
